description: Hans-Kristian Arntzen today announced the released of VKD3D-Proton version 2.13, the Direct3D 12 API on top of Vulkan translator for Proton.
title: VKD3D-Proton v2.13 has updates for OpenVR / OpenXR, performance improvements + more

description: There sure are a lot of survivor-like bullet-heaven games now aren't there. So, to help cut through the noise just a bit, a whole bunch just teamed up for the special Self-Published Survivors Bundle.
title: The Self-Published Survivors Bundle on Steam gives you 9 positively rated games for cheaps

description: PRIM, a creepy-but-cute point’n’click adventure game full of dark humour, is looking really good and there's a brand new trailer to show it off.
title: Check out the new trailer for PRIM, a creepy-but-cute point’n’click dark humour adventure

description: After killing off and selling off various studios and cause lots of job losses, Embracer Group have put out their latest annual report and they have big plans for AI.
title: Embracer Group put out their plans for AI in game development

description: X4: Foundations 7.00 Update and X4: Timelines from Egosoft bring some huge changes to the huge space sim and there's never been a better time to try it out.
title: X4: Foundations Update 7.00 and X4: Timelines DLC are out now

description: Death Trash features a world where cosmic horrors long for humanity but meet punks with shotguns. Influenced by post-apocalyptic, horror, and cyberpunk classics. Death Trash is certainly promising, and it's finally gearing up for a content update.
title: Cosmic horror post-apocalyptic RPG Death Trash has a teaser for a new update

description: Developer Bippinbits have announced PVKK: Planetenverteidigungskanonenkommandant (yes really) as their next game following Dome Keeper. It looks suspiciously like Dome Keeper is 3D, but it's a lot more than that.
title: PVKK from the Dome Keeper devs has you manually control a massive planetary defence cannon

description: Valve has launched another small update for the Steam Deck with SteamOS 3.6.6 Preview now available for testing which may be essential if you're playing ELDEN RING.
title: SteamOS 3.6.6 Preview for Steam Deck has fixes for ELDEN RING, system memory leak and more
